website_summaries.verdict: Every ingredient in this freeze-dried blend is either raw or in its natural state. No fillers or hard-to-digest grains.
pros: Freeze-dried raw beef is first ingredient
Contains raw superfoods such as alfalfa, kale, and pumpkin
Natural enzymes not destroyed by heat
cons: May not provide the total number of rehydrated meals promoted

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I used to like this product but they have changed the recipe. More vegetables and bigger hard to chew pieces of meat. I won't buy it again. The extra expense was worth it before but not any more. And my dog is not impressed. She used to love it. I emailed the company to tell them (politely) that I didn't like this new product as much. Their response verged on rude. They could have cared less.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: While I like the quality of food
customer_reviews.text: While I like the quality of food,I’m only given big this 3 stars as they changed there packaging from 2 lbs to 1.75 pounds and charging more. It use to say that this will make 10 lbs of food. It now states on the package that it makes “up to” 10 lbs. so, a 1/4 of a pound less for more money now. I have fed this for years, but looks like I’ll be making the switch to Honest Kitchen now.
customer_reviews.author: N. Winrod

customer_reviews.title: He doesn't love the vegetables unless it has hydrated for a day ...
customer_reviews.text: First food my dog will consistently eat. He doesn't love the vegetables unless it has hydrated for a day or more in the fridge. I recommend mixing a 2 cups with water in a gallon ziploc and leaving it in the fridge. You can do several bags at once and once they have softened a bit you can throw the extras in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Sira

customer_reviews.title: Love the brand but...
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, but they have been going downhill I think. I use to sell sojos. Since everything has changed, they have taken a pound out of the bag and raised the price. Also this beef one use to actually smell like a beef stew and soaked up a lot quicker. But now it takes forever to soak up. As well, it doesn't smell like beef stew anymore lol.... It smells like beef tripe... which people who know what tripe is, it's very nasty smelling lol. My girls still like it, so I guess I can't complain. Just sucks they raised the price and have taken a freakin pound out of it! Still going to purchase still though...
customer_reviews.author: Durchi

customer_reviews.title: HAVE YOU CHANGED THE INGREDIENTS?
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old male Bichon Frise has been eating Sojos complete natural freeze-dried raw & dehydrated grain-free dog food for almost 9 yrs. Lately he goes over and sniffs his food and walks away. He really doesn't want to eat it. He is still very healthy and will eat his treats. It is just the dog food he walks away from. Have you changed the ingredients in this food. Can you recommend something else similar to this food? I know you are not supposed to change food, but it is a real challenge for him to eat this food, Please advise.
customer_reviews.author: Rose A.

customer_reviews.title: Raw food made easy
customer_reviews.text: I switch up my dogs food occasionally and I’ve purchased Sojos SO many times over the years for my dogs. The ingredients are quality and a raw diet has so many benefits. It takes just a couple minutes of prep to measure the food and water. It is like raw feeding done easy. I use raw to mix in with kibble (about 50 / 50) and my dogs love their food soo much more with the raw included (their lives are short, they should enjoy meals as much as possible!!). The bag lasts longer than you expect since you mix water with it. Sojos is a brand I trust and I feel good about feeding it to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was Expecting
customer_reviews.text: OK, so this food just didn't work for my dogs. They didn't want to eat it! I'm still not sure why, because none of them are fussy about what they eat. I thought the food smelled odd and was super chunky. Waiting for it to hydrate wasn't too bad, as I just did some tidying while I waited. I wasn't really clear on what temperature the water should be though (we used warm). Ultimately, we've decided to stick with The Honest Kitchen for now and threw most of Sojos bag away.
customer_reviews.author: SeñoritaAmanteDelPerro

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag, sojo  company didn’t care
customer_reviews.text: Been using this food for 2 years, 1 bag gave two of my dogs upset stomachs, horrible breath and made them super gassy. Called customer service to report and they denied having problems with attitude. Back to honest kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda shiller

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this food. I got the best results when I made a few days worth at a time and let it rehydrate in the fridge overnight. The picture is of the food partially hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great product - so glad it was added to the Sojo's line
customer_reviews.text: My two Bichons have been eating Sojo's daily for about a year now since one of them became allergic to the Honest Kitchen food when they changed the formula to mostly powder and far less chunks of dried food. We had to go to the veterinary ER twice in 3 days and they had to give her appetite stimulants to get her to eat again. Now both are thriving on the Sojo's and so far the chicken is the favorite of the picky eater. Heartily recommended by Sophie and Lexie.
customer_reviews.author: DFA94

customer_reviews.title: Frenchie loves it
customer_reviews.text: My french bulldog loves this food. We had go this pack for him to try adn we went back and bought a large bag after. We got this food do to the limited ingredients. Our frenchie does have some allergies but with this food he has been fine. Noticed his coat has gotten softer as well. We mix this food with dry dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Raz

customer_reviews.title: Great easy raw dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. For those complaining that it comes out soupy, umm duh add less water. Come on guys we didn’t get this far as a species without a bit of common sense. For those complaining that their dog won’t eat it, mix it with their old food or some dry food and slowly use more of the Sojos and less of the other food. A dog won’t let itself starve. My dog loves the beef, turkey and goat recipes. As with any new food, you have to introduce it slowly for the sake of their digestive processes. My dog has a better coat, breath, dental health and more energy overall. Stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Run through blender for little dogs. New formula?  Not nearly as good
customer_reviews.text: I have to go to the trouble of putting new bag through blender. The huge chunks, especially carrots aren’t doable. Save old bag, run dry through blender and pour in old bag. This extra hassle docks a star. Whatta bout little dogs? Especially older who have lost teeth? This creates the oatmeal texture after adding water. Last 2 bags haven't smelled right and my voracious dog is refusing to eat it by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs LOVE This
customer_reviews.text: They never get tired of it. I think its a well made dog food, sourced and made here in the US. It smells tasty. Its convenient and seems like a very healthy food. I mix it with their kibble. Sometimes its too much powder and not enough larger pieces but I have returned it to get it replaced with no problems. I highly recommend this food. It's been tops around this house for years now!
customer_reviews.author: barbara s.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog had a UTI a few years ago and the vet suggested feeding her wet food as part of her diet to make sure she was getting more fluids to keep her bladder funcioning well. I was trying to find a food that didn't have a lot of salt and random fillers and found this food at a local pet store. My dog loves it! Eats it right up! I've fed her the variety of flavors and she likes them all. It's easy to make and even though it's a bit pricier, I think it's worth it to know you're feeding your dog whole foods.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Great alternative to canned dog food. I have tried for years to keep my dogs healthy and happy with their food. Sometimes that was a challenge. Not since giving them Sojos. I've been feeding this to my babies now for about 3 months and they are always eager to eat it. No more waste and my dogs are getting the healtiest meal out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: My 14 year old dog is acting like a pup
customer_reviews.text: I have zoomies again in my 14 year old Westie! He even does a dance at dinner time; thought I'd never see that kind of enthusiasm again. His coat looks great, does not strain to poop. Vet tells me he is doing beautifully, for any age. I rehydrate 1 1/2 cups in his bowl during the morning routine before work, remove from the fridge for about 10 minutes at 5PM, add a slight bit of water, mix & serve. Easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: Nyand

customer_reviews.title: Great food! Great value! Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the price sway your decision. This bag makes so much dog food. My dogs love it and so do I. Look at the ingredients! When you look at the food in the bag you can see all the freeze dried ingredients in there. Some other competitors food looks like sawdust. Try this food you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Infiesto

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wish the product was less expensive because I am going to start feeding it to y 2nd dog as soon as she consumes the last of her other food, although I may decide to donate it to a shelter. The results for my Malti-poo have been positive. He is not scooting his little rear across the floor is the most notable and he is fired up about getting a bowl of his dog food every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOG FOOD EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my two dogs on this for about a year. The older dog (19 years old) was told by the VET he looks better now than he did a few years ago. He has a spring in his step and can't wait to eat. He also stopped chewing on his paw as much as he did before. I've recommended this to a few friends and family members, and they wont feed anything else to their dogs now. It's really amazing food!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lola approves it!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to transition my furr baby into healthier food options. Her stomach is sensitive and she's very picky. Although she picks through her favorite ingredients in this food, she leaves some of the (fruits) behind. I did notice that she's not tearing as much, her eyes are a little drier (she's a maltese) but that could be from the other supplements Im giving her too. Overall I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bee_Edge

customer_reviews.title: None of the pets would eat this
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product because our dog has really been happy eating rehydrated freeze-dried meat in the past. But she didn't like the smell of this and wouldn't eat it. I don't know if it's because it has vegetables or spices. I made sure to shake the bag first and mix everything. She still wouldn't eat it at all. I offered it to our cats and they didn't like the product either. So I had to throw the bags out.
customer_reviews.author: SWD

customer_reviews.title: good food
customer_reviews.text: I snacked it a couple of times while watching my favorite film "Alpha" but I had to drink a lot to wash it down. I decided it was better as a breakfast with milk and even with orange juice. Oh wait...this is dog food... Anyway, 5 stars from me and my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Arno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality dog food.
customer_reviews.text: I try to give my dogs the best quality food. Sojos is one of the natural foods I keep on hand. My dogs LOVE it. It is very similar to Honest Kitchen which my dogs also love. I try to give them as much raw food as I can but I mix it up for them as my 3 dogs are all a bit fussy for different foods.
customer_reviews.author: Debs

customer_reviews.title: Recent downgrades?
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for awhile, and my super-picky schnauzer loves this food. In addition to soaking it, I have to cook it in order to get her to eat it, but I'm just glad she'll eat something I don't have to make from scratch that doesn't make her sick. Only downside - I don't think the food is making as much as it once did. I fix it the same, and there is no way it's expanding to feed her as long as it used to. I'm having to buy it about three times as often.
customer_reviews.author: Travels With Poppy

customer_reviews.title: The best food you can ever get for your dog
customer_reviews.text: The best food you can ever get for your dog. Our pups are wild about it. We discovered it from a neighbor last July 4 at a party. One of our dogs wasn’t eating because we assumed she just didn’t like to eat. We tried every kind of food. THEN i hopped on Amazon to see if the product was sold here...it was. I placed an order, made a batch (just add water) and she devoured it. It’s the best. Sometimes we mix it with Trader Joe’s hard food to help challenge their teeth and gums
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McCord

customer_reviews.title: Started as a transition and now we are subscribers!
customer_reviews.text: This dog food has been a wonderful transition into a raw diet for my dogs. We are new to the raw diet, so we started with sojos as it is just add water and wait! You can see the dried cranberries and carrot, and our dogs think it is delicious. I tried another, cheaper brand and it always looked like alpo. This always looks like a stew and even smells good. We are subscribers now and it’s been three months!
customer_reviews.author: JediJessi31

customer_reviews.title: Our Pup is older and Loved this suff from the first bowl
customer_reviews.text: Smells like stuffing on thanks giving when fully made. Our older pup devours it with in a few mins every time we make a bowl...we try to do one dry and one of these a day cause shes not so active but since theres about 40 bowls its worth the money and half the space of the dry food. Great product! fast sellers 2
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it pretty well, however, the water to food ratio is too much. I cut the water in half and it’s not so mushy. I mix half Sojos and half high quality dry kibble with warm eater, wait 10 minutes, mix again and serve.
customer_reviews.author: CLMinCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this stuff. It’s pretty easy - you just add water, stir and let it sit. The only reason I don’t give it 5 stars is because you have to let it sit and rehydrated for 15 mins. I understand that it’s part of the process but me and my dog are too impatient so we only give this to her a couple times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Very good food
customer_reviews.text: Get this for my puppies. They liked it a lot I actually have this on auto replenish every three months I had a little pup so I don't have to get it very often and I mix it with another organic grain-free hard kibble. They absolutely love it. It used to be 19.99 and now it's gone up quite a bit in preiss I don't like that so much but hey what are you going to do
customer_reviews.author: Breeze

customer_reviews.title: Caused outbreaks, now dog won’t eat.
customer_reviews.text: After one day of feeding my dog the turkey formula, a horrible rash had app aired all over her chest and belly. She now refuses to eat it anymore, and the company won’t allow returns.
customer_reviews.author: loves-family

customer_reviews.title: She has transitioned well to this diet and has had great poops. She loves it and I so do
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old cocker spaniel is allergic to chicken and needs to be on a senior diet. It was almost impossible to find a senior food with no chicken, until I found this. She tends to have a sensitive stomach so I was a little worried at first. She has transitioned well to this diet and has had great poops. She loves it and I so do! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog did not like it
customer_reviews.text: I had a few Lamb Sojos trial size that the Breeder sent home with the puppy. She loved that stuff. I went ahead and bought the Puppy version (Salmon and Poultry) and the pup would barely touch it. I'll try the Lamb at some point - but steer clear of the Salmon stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BrettScout

customer_reviews.title: My dogs do like it, and right now
customer_reviews.text: It's really too early to tell about the efficacy of this freeze dry raw food. My dogs do like it, and right now, I'm mixing with a little kibble and some canned food. Plus they get fresh raw paddy in the morning. I'm basing this review on the fact the dogs scarf it up, and they seem to be doing well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Charming

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love them but too expensive Being a dog rescue and giving out treats to Multiple dogs this is something that’s not affordable to a small rescue I had inquired with local sales rep about donations but evidently she left the company not sure contact
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Senior dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our senior dog with severe intestinal issues. We mix it equal parts with water and brown rice and it’s the only product we found that produces solid waste out the other end. It’s pricey but it’s expensive everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie E.

customer_reviews.title: More consistency needed
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food! But it's too bad that every bag isn't the same. For eg. this bag has a lot of chunks which means it stays watery instead of when it's more ground up and then the water gets more absorbed and it's a thicker consistency. I'm disappointed in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: kathyn2kwx

customer_reviews.title: Better consistency than competitors, more meat too
customer_reviews.text: I like the consistency of this product over Grandma Lucy's and Honest kitchen. There areore chunks of meat and actual pieces of vegetables in this product. The others turn Into a sloppy porridge. Yes it's for a dog but she. You have to clean out the dried pieces from their bowl it's no fun. With this product my dog eats every last bit.
customer_reviews.author: David Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps going up! Amount of food goes down!
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes this food and it keeps him from scratching since he's allergic to grains. For that, I give the food 5 stars. HOWEVER, Sojos keeps raising the price of this food. In July 2018, I bought a bag of this food for 75 dollars, in August I had to pay 85 dollars, and now in September a bag is 90 dollars. And to top it off they reduced the weight of their bag from 8 pounds in July to 7 pounds in September. For this I give the company 1 star. If this continues I will find an alternate dog food.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Dunsmore

customer_reviews.title: My dog goes crazy for this food. He does ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy for this food. He does spins in the kitchen when I am making it. It does take a bit to soak, so I pre-make a couple days in advance and put it in the fridge because he just can't wait (I can't stand the crying, haha). He does not do well with grains, so I thought I would give this a try, he has lost weight and has regular bowel movements now. Thank god.
customer_reviews.author: derro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't  rehydrate
customer_reviews.text: Even with boiling water, this food didn't rehydrate very well. I bought it for a very small dog; the pieces were too large and hard for her to chew them up. Maybe if I whirled it up in the blender, but if I'm going to do that, then I might as well make my own dog food. Taste wise, my dog loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: Switched for health reasons and have not been disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog with a grain sensitivity, so grain free is must. She has also had cancer twice. Since changing her to SOJOS the cancer has not returned. She has healthy coat and the spirit of a pup half her age.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorblu

customer_reviews.title: All cranberries
customer_reviews.text: This has so many cranberries that my dog wont even eat it. It's the only solid thing in the bag the rest is powder so when you get it wet its like mushy vomit. Dont buy this if you don't want cranberries all over your house
customer_reviews.author: ashley briggs

customer_reviews.title: My dogs won’t eat it
customer_reviews.text: No way...add extra ground beef, ground turkey....chicken...they won’t eat it. Can’t return. Expensive as well. Sorry I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: klaz

customer_reviews.title: What Happened?
customer_reviews.text: Been getting this product for quite some time and were incredibly happy. When reconstituted it used to smell good enough for me to eat and my dog would absolutely go nuts as soon as she saw the bag. Now this product smells different and my dog won't touch it. I suspect they have changed owners or something because it has definitely changed.
customer_reviews.author: ConverterJoe

customer_reviews.title: Good dried dog food
customer_reviews.text: My pooched love Sojos. To them the 15 minute wait to brew is worth it!. There coats are shiny and teeth are clean.
customer_reviews.author: LSal

customer_reviews.title: No more allergies and nighttime itching
customer_reviews.text: My dogs enjoy the cooking process. Their allergies are gone and they believe this tastes like Thanksgiving Dinner. Sometimes soupy but they don’t care. They anticipate the food while it cooks.
customer_reviews.author: CF-JM

customer_reviews.title: Money Saver, Freezer Space Saver, Time Saver and best of all: Less Mess!
customer_reviews.text: A convenient way to feed your dog raw food. No more blood all over the kitchen, running out of freezer space or waiting for food to defrost. Add water to Sojos and it is ready in as little as 15 minutes. It saves me time and money. Plus, my dogs absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: AliKat

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I gave a small amount of this mixed into other food to my 15 year old Shih Tzu and within 48 hours she was vomiting and having bloody diarrhea. We ended up having to visit to the vet and she was put on glucose and given a shot to help with nausea. No food is worth putting an dog in such distress.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: My dog seems to like the turkey as well as the lamb recipe
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like the turkey as well as the lamb recipe. As long as she eats it. she is 13 years old & has a day now & then where she won;t eat at all. I mix this with Taste of the wild dry dog food and feel she gets everything she needs. once & a while I'll make some sliced carrots cooked in chicken broth and add to this mix.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Desch

customer_reviews.title: This is better tasting than the decaying squirrel carcass that I dug ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used mind control to hijack my humans facilities while he is sleeping and set up a re-occurring order of this food. This is better tasting than the decaying squirrel carcass that I dug up and brought inside the other day. My human adds water and I get delicious, gravy rich, healthy food. Winner, winner freeze dried lamb for dinner. Dog.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like this a lot
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m guessing the flavor is good my dogs like it they look forward to breakfast every morning
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: New and worse
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed with this new food formula. My dogs are always hungry. I’m going to try to contact the company to see what they say. Will report back after I see response.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Shockley

customer_reviews.title: Dog Won't Touch
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the package there was a very strong smell of celery, very strong. My dog wouldn't touch this food, actually jumped back a little when she smelled it. Wasted my $$$$$.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Takes awhile to make
customer_reviews.text: This food is ok, not great- if you’re in s hurry or your dog’s really hungry it takes 15 minutes to sit and even then it doesn’t seem very soft. My dog ate it but not his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Schmookaloo

customer_reviews.title: Dependable Sojos
customer_reviews.text: As long as Sojos keeps the same recipes I feel comfortable feeding this to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: jessia

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding this to my black lab since she was a puppy. Mix with dry kibble and water. She loves it and at 7-1/2 years is happy and never had any health issues. Good food makes a good dog. Training doesn't hurt either.
customer_reviews.author: Ranch Hand

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I came across Sojos
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I came across Sojos! The daycare that I bring my dog to recommended it to me. My dog, Saint is extremely stubborn and picky about his food. Believe it or not, we’ve tried over 5 kibble brands ( earthbound holistic, Merricks, fromm, wellness core, pure balance, purina, etc.) and he didn’t favor absolutely any of it. Since we introduced Sojos to him, he’s never been more excited to eat! So so happy our baby is eating.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O

customer_reviews.title: I like the format, smells nice but my Chihuahuas will not eat eat unless I've starved them for a day.
customer_reviews.text: So here's the deal.. I think it's okay but my Chihuahua's will not eat it. On the second day they start picking through it and only eat little bits here & there. I find little orange pieces everywhere in the living room. This product was highly recommended by a group of CHihuahua owners as the best food available and that ALL dogs love it. Not true. Mine won't have it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Maentz

customer_reviews.title: Too much poop
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food which is great for little, picky dogs. However, it's really hard to digest and made them poop ALL OF THE TIME. I would let it hydrate for 12 hours minimum and still tough to digest. I would add probiotics and still tough to digest. Because they loved this food though, it was a snap transitioning them to raw food which was previously disliked.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Dog food was more than 6 months past expiration date!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Check expiration dates! I ordered sojos November 13th, 2018. Just opened the bag to feed my puppy and noticed that the expiration date is May 2, 2018!!! Over 6 months expired for a dehydrated raw dog food. Good thing I checked the date or my puppy could've gotten really sick! Do not buy Sojos here!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Darla approved...
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a life saver with our picky eater. She has only been on it for a week but she has really taken to this food and loves it and looks forward to the next meal. I think it smells amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great food for senior dogs
customer_reviews.text: My little dog gobbles this food up. 15 minute prep time in hot water
customer_reviews.author: Smart Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: I started feeding my senior dog Sojos when she could no longer eat kibble. All of her allergies and skin issues disappeared, she started playing again and lived another four years. I never dreamed this would happen. I started feeding my three year old Labrador Sojos and at nine years he still acts like a puppy. This dog food works miracles!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food for healthy dogs
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this dog food! My 8 year old terrier mix has been eating it since day 1. He is full of energy and has not had any major health problems. I attribute it to his healthy diet of Sojos food and drinking alkaline water.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs all love it. One of my dogs gets this as ...
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs all love it. One of my dogs gets this as her main diet and my other dogs get it over their dry food. It is expensive, in my opinion. Claims mixed with water its the same as 40 lbs. It may be.
customer_reviews.author: N. Arleth

customer_reviews.title: Product smells good, dogs are not really interested in eating it
customer_reviews.text: Seems that my dogs are having large amount of looser stools since starting this product. And yes they were slowly introduced to the new food. Product smells good, dogs are not really interested in eating it :/ I still have 1/2 a bag and will see if anything improves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog did not enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My pitty did not like this dog food. I tried multiple times with both the complete and pre-mix sojos with no luck. I wish I would have had the pre-mix trial size, I could have saved some money.
customer_reviews.author: ColePins08

customer_reviews.title: Shitzu loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My small dog loves his new food! Due to allergies, he only eats raw food. This is by far the best and easiest food, preparation wise, that I've purchased thus far. He devours every morsel, however, I do recommend mixing it with another food in order to prevent weight loss or increasing portion sizes. At first, Ewee (he looks like an Ewok) lost a considerable amount of weight on this food, so I had to increase his portions to compensate. Other than that I think it's a great, healthy product! Oh yeah, and it lasts for at least a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amante

customer_reviews.title: My dog is obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I haven’t been able to find a senior food without chicken (my dog can’t have it) until I came across this. He loves it. I’ll probably buy other flavors for my other two dogs because now they’re jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Recommended to me by our Vet
customer_reviews.text: This food makes feeding my dog so easy! It sure beats fighting with raw food every day and delivers the complete nutrients I was looking for. It was recommended to me by our veterinarian as a great alternative to freezing and storing raw food.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Stout

customer_reviews.title: Diarrhea with every new bag
customer_reviews.text: Gave my dogs massive diarrhea for two weeks while I was mixing with their other food. Thought we were out of the woods then the new bag of Sojos gave them diarrhea again. The food varies from bag to bag?
customer_reviews.author: bsn1620

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the food---I feed raw but like to add a variety. So this gives the dogs the extra veggies and another protein source
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but good.
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good dog food. Like some reviewers, I felt that my dog was hungrier than usual. For the cost of the food, I don't think it should need to be supplemented with more meat, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: A.T.Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase - our dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves it and it’s lasting far longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Button

customer_reviews.title: Heavily seasoned soup
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t like this heavily seasoned soup like food. It’s messy to prepare and eat. It bothers her even more than it bothers me.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Good high quality food for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dog's love all the flavours, it's so easy and great four traveling!
customer_reviews.author: S K

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: My Dachshunds love these. The bits are small about the size of an m&m and can be rehydrated or eaten as they come. Bag isn’t very large or full and so, I don’t know if the product justifies the cost.
customer_reviews.author: dawn jordan

customer_reviews.title: Freezed Dried Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my dogs but they weren't very excited about it.
customer_reviews.author: DebraV

customer_reviews.title: It was a good idea in theory but there's better brands out there ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely doesn't make 40lbs worth of food... don't be fooled. I have 3 dogs. Two eat 4 cups a day, one eats 3. If this really did make 40lbs of food it should have lasted at least a week and a half, if not 2 but it only lasted 3 DAYS. It was a good idea in theory but there's better brands out there like The Honest Kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Analiese M.

customer_reviews.title: It is raw made easy and safe
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding Sojos of some type for 4 years with extremely positive results! We have seen old dogs with lots of healthy issues improve dramatically on Sojos. It is raw made easy and safe. Easy to travel with, you can mix just what you need or mix it up for three days. Most all dogs seem to love it on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: CBClark

customer_reviews.title: is good brand, but for my dog
customer_reviews.text: is good brand , but for my dog , is very picky , doesn't likes, I gave to my daughter dogs and they love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puppy’s fave!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is picky and loves anything Sojos. Especially this !!
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My papillons LOVE this stuff! I add a boiled egg, brown rice and quinoa. I'll never look back! It's so good for them. So far my biggest girl has slowly lost 1lb. She has just 1 more to go... and I feed her 3 times a day!!! (little meals work perfect!) Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: ImaJewelaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not our best experience
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seems to have a lot if waste ;poop" with this food. We're were not happy with this. Usually natural food there is minimal waste and it is not smelly. If I had bought locally I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: SO YUMMY AND HEALTHY!!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE THIS FOOD. I pour a little hot water over the scoop on their bowl and it gets juicy and so yummy🐾🐾 The ingredients are so nutritious for your furry friend
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: New formula lots of changes
customer_reviews.text: New formula is different. More carrots makes no sense as doggies can’t digest. Now states globally sourced but does not detail? Where is the Beef sourced? A shame as my dog loved the old formula
customer_reviews.author: Kim Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable raw food alternative for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This raw food formula is inexpensive compared to other raw food diets out there for dogs. It is easy to reconstitute and I can make a 2-3 day batch and store it in the fridge. I have fed this for years to three dogs that have severe allergies and I've never had any issues with it. I hope they never stop making it!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dogs or teeth issues.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this. They eat it up with no time wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: so it was recommended that I switch he to a raw diet
customer_reviews.text: In March my dog was diagnosed as a diabetic, so it was recommended that I switch he to a raw diet. I found recommendations for Sojo and when I didn't started buying it my dog loved it, she ate it all up very quickly. Then a couple months later she stopes wanting to eat it, wouldn't even go near it. It seems they made a slight change and there is more of the veggie filler then the actual beef. Pretty bummed as I was really hoping this was going to be the anwser for her new diet.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B

customer_reviews.title: I like solo's, and my dogs do too
customer_reviews.text: I like solo's, and my dogs do too. Some people seem concerned as to whether there is enough protein. I do supplement this with various meats every now and then. My dogs seem to do very well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies
customer_reviews.text: My pug puppies thrive on this. They get too violent on Origen puppy, this one mixed 1/3 Eukanuba puppy and 2/3 Sojos is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: danica21

customer_reviews.title: Dog does not recognize this product as food
customer_reviews.text: My dog does not recognize this product as food and will not eat this product... I was quite surprised because my dog eats EVERYTHING.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this food! It is easy is easy to make! One of my dogs has allergies to dust mites, that is why I have switched to this dog food, it does seem to be helping!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bell

customer_reviews.title: It's my backup brand
customer_reviews.text: My three Chihuahuas will eat this but seem to have a preference for other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kasten

customer_reviews.title: doesn't like, I gave to my daughter dogs and they
customer_reviews.text: my dogs is very picky , doesn't like , I gave to my daughter dogs and they love
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like spinach!
customer_reviews.text: My Pom just turned his nose up and wouldn't eat a bite. I sprinkled the dry product over my Blue Heeler's food and she ate it like candy! I will keep trying with the Pom because he has Cushing's Disease and really needs it. Seems to be more veggies than meat and smelled like spinach.
customer_reviews.author: DrPepper1330

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love I but even shaking and tossing bag leaves non meat items at the bottom of bag leaving dogs hungry last few days of using the bag up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael P.

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin rich
customer_reviews.text: Happy that my dog loves it and it won’t give him the runs nor does it make him constipated.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

product_meta.title: Sojos Complete Natural Freeze-Dried Natural Raw & Dehydrated Grain-Free Dog Food
product_meta.description: Style:Adult| Flavor Name:Beef| Size:7 lbSojos’ proven “raw made easy” recipes are now even meatier and chunkier—and specially formulated for adults. Just add water and magic happens. In minutes the awesome taste, aroma and nutrition in Sojos’ real, farm-fresh ingredients are ready to serve. No mess, no hassles, no guesswork. It’s fresh, whole food without refrigeration.
feature_bullets: Raw Dog Food: Just add water, soak and serve; in minutes the shelf stable ingredients spring back to life with flavors, textures and abundant nutrition possible only with real, raw, grain free food
Natural and Raw: Our Complete recipes are made with no genetically engineered ingredients, soy, fillers, preservatives, or anything artificial; just a short, sweet list of nutritious ingredients

Safe and Economical: Every pound of Sojos makes up to 5 pounds of fresh, raw food for a surprisingly budget friendly cost per serving; our gentle, proprietary freeze drying process makes raw meat safe without heat or chemicals

Simple Preparation: Add water to Sojos and magic happens; in minutes the shelf stable ingredients spring back to life with the flavors, textures and abundant nutrition possible only with real, raw food
Raw Made Easy: Our complete and balanced foods combine the easy prep and shelf stable convenience of kibble with the unsurpassed nutrition offered in real, raw food; the only thing missing is water

Made in the USA using only the finest globally sourced ingredients, we prepare each of our diets in our own state of the art facility; we craft delicious natural recipes with wholesome, non GMO ingredients chosen for their nutritional benefits

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
